title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, it is observed that the 'Close Project' menu item is not available, while the 'Open Project' menu item is present.
EB: When both projects P1 and P2 are selected, both the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items should be available.
SR: Create two projects, P1 and P2. Select P2 and attempt to close it.
